00022 btHeightfieldTerrainShape::btHeightfieldTerrainShape
00023 (
00024 int heightStickWidth, int heightStickLength, const void* heightfieldData,
00025 btScalar heightScale, btScalar minHeight, btScalar maxHeight,int upAxis,
00026 PHY_ScalarType hdt, bool flipQuadEdges
00027 )
00028 {
00029         initialize(heightStickWidth, heightStickLength, heightfieldData,
00030                    heightScale, minHeight, maxHeight, upAxis, hdt,
00031                    flipQuadEdges);

00035 
00036 btHeightfieldTerrainShape::btHeightfieldTerrainShape(int heightStickWidth, int heightStickLength,const void* heightfieldData,btScalar maxHeight,int upAxis,bool useFloatData,bool flipQuadEdges)
00037 {
00038         // legacy constructor: support only float or unsigned char,
00039         //      and min height is zero
00040         PHY_ScalarType hdt = (useFloatData) ? PHY_FLOAT : PHY_UCHAR;
00041         btScalar minHeight = 0.0f;
00042 
00043         // previously, height = uchar * maxHeight / 65535.
00044         // So to preserve legacy behavior, heightScale = maxHeight / 65535
00045         btScalar heightScale = maxHeight / 65535;
00046 
00047         initialize(heightStickWidth, heightStickLength, heightfieldData,
00048                    heightScale, minHeight, maxHeight, upAxis, hdt,
00049                    flipQuadEdges);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054 void btHeightfieldTerrainShape::initialize
00055 (
00056 int heightStickWidth, int heightStickLength, const void* heightfieldData,
00057 btScalar heightScale, btScalar minHeight, btScalar maxHeight, int upAxis,
00058 PHY_ScalarType hdt, bool flipQuadEdges
00059 )
00060 {
00061         // validation
00062         btAssert(heightStickWidth > 1);// && "bad width");
00063         btAssert(heightStickLength > 1);// && "bad length");
00064         btAssert(heightfieldData);// && "null heightfield data");
00065         // btAssert(heightScale) -- do we care?  Trust caller here
00066         btAssert(minHeight <= maxHeight);// && "bad min/max height");
00067         btAssert(upAxis >= 0 && upAxis < 3);// && "bad upAxis--should be in range [0,2]");
00068         btAssert(hdt != PHY_UCHAR || hdt != PHY_FLOAT || hdt != PHY_SHORT);// && "Bad height data type enum");
00069 
00070         // initialize member variables
00071         m_shapeType = TERRAIN_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE;
00072         m_heightStickWidth = heightStickWidth;
00073         m_heightStickLength = heightStickLength;
00074         m_minHeight = minHeight;
00075         m_maxHeight = maxHeight;
00076         m_width = (btScalar) (heightStickWidth - 1);
00077         m_length = (btScalar) (heightStickLength - 1);
00078         m_heightScale = heightScale;
00079         m_heightfieldDataUnknown = heightfieldData;
00080         m_heightDataType = hdt;
00081         m_flipQuadEdges = flipQuadEdges;
00082         m_useDiamondSubdivision = false;
00083         m_useZigzagSubdivision = false;
00084         m_upAxis = upAxis;
00085         m_localScaling.setValue(btScalar(1.), btScalar(1.), btScalar(1.));
00086 
00087         // determine min/max axis-aligned bounding box (aabb) values
00088         switch (m_upAxis)
00089         {
00090         case 0:
00091                 {
00092                         m_localAabbMin.setValue(m_minHeight, 0, 0);
00093                         m_localAabbMax.setValue(m_maxHeight, m_width, m_length);
00094                         break;
00095                 }
00096         case 1:
00097                 {
00098                         m_localAabbMin.setValue(0, m_minHeight, 0);
00099                         m_localAabbMax.setValue(m_width, m_maxHeight, m_length);
00100                         break;
00101                 };
00102         case 2:
00103                 {
00104                         m_localAabbMin.setValue(0, 0, m_minHeight);
00105                         m_localAabbMax.setValue(m_width, m_length, m_maxHeight);
00106                         break;
00107                 }
00108         default:
00109                 {
00110                         //need to get valid m_upAxis
00111                         btAssert(0);// && "Bad m_upAxis");
00112                 }
00113         }
00114 
00115         // remember origin (defined as exact middle of aabb)
00116         m_localOrigin = btScalar(0.5) * (m_localAabbMin + m_localAabbMax);
00117 }

00121 btHeightfieldTerrainShape::~btHeightfieldTerrainShape()
00122 {
00123 }

00125 
00126 
00127 void btHeightfieldTerrainShape::getAabb(const btTransform& t,btVector3& aabbMin,btVector3& aabbMax) const
00128 {
00129         btVector3 halfExtents = (m_localAabbMax-m_localAabbMin)* m_localScaling * btScalar(0.5);
00130 
00131         btVector3 localOrigin(0, 0, 0);
00132         localOrigin[m_upAxis] = (m_minHeight + m_maxHeight) * btScalar(0.5);
00133         localOrigin *= m_localScaling;
00134 
00135         btMatrix3x3 abs_b = t.getBasis().absolute();  
00136         btVector3 center = t.getOrigin();
00137     btVector3 extent = halfExtents.dot3(abs_b[0], abs_b[1], abs_b[2]);
00138         extent += btVector3(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00139 
00140         aabbMin = center - extent;
00141         aabbMax = center + extent;
00142 }

00144 
00148 btScalar
00149 btHeightfieldTerrainShape::getRawHeightFieldValue(int x,int y) const
00150 {
00151         btScalar val = 0.f;
00152         switch (m_heightDataType)
00153         {
00154         case PHY_FLOAT:
00155                 {
00156                         val = m_heightfieldDataFloat[(y*m_heightStickWidth)+x];
00157                         break;
00158                 }
00159 
00160         case PHY_UCHAR:
00161                 {
00162                         unsigned char heightFieldValue = m_heightfieldDataUnsignedChar[(y*m_heightStickWidth)+x];
00163                         val = heightFieldValue * m_heightScale;
00164                         break;
00165                 }
00166 
00167         case PHY_SHORT:
00168                 {
00169                         short hfValue = m_heightfieldDataShort[(y * m_heightStickWidth) + x];
00170                         val = hfValue * m_heightScale;
00171                         break;
00172                 }
00173 
00174         default:
00175                 {
00176                         btAssert(!"Bad m_heightDataType");
00177                 }
00178         }
00179 
00180         return val;
00181 }

00185 
00187 void    btHeightfieldTerrainShape::getVertex(int x,int y,btVector3& vertex) const
00188 {
00189         btAssert(x>=0);
00190         btAssert(y>=0);
00191         btAssert(x<m_heightStickWidth);
00192         btAssert(y<m_heightStickLength);
00193 
00194         btScalar        height = getRawHeightFieldValue(x,y);
00195 
00196         switch (m_upAxis)
00197         {
00198         case 0:
00199                 {
00200                 vertex.setValue(
00201                         height - m_localOrigin.getX(),
00202                         (-m_width/btScalar(2.0)) + x,
00203                         (-m_length/btScalar(2.0) ) + y
00204                         );
00205                         break;
00206                 }
00207         case 1:
00208                 {
00209                         vertex.setValue(
00210                         (-m_width/btScalar(2.0)) + x,
00211                         height - m_localOrigin.getY(),
00212                         (-m_length/btScalar(2.0)) + y
00213                         );
00214                         break;
00215                 };
00216         case 2:
00217                 {
00218                         vertex.setValue(
00219                         (-m_width/btScalar(2.0)) + x,
00220                         (-m_length/btScalar(2.0)) + y,
00221                         height - m_localOrigin.getZ()
00222                         );
00223                         break;
00224                 }
00225         default:
00226                 {
00227                         //need to get valid m_upAxis
00228                         btAssert(0);
00229                 }
00230         }
00231 
00232         vertex*=m_localScaling;
00233 }

00236 
00237 static inline int
00238 getQuantized
00239 (
00240 btScalar x
00241 )
00242 {
00243         if (x < 0.0) {
00244                 return (int) (x - 0.5);
00245         }
00246         return (int) (x + 0.5);
00247 }

00252 
00260 void btHeightfieldTerrainShape::quantizeWithClamp(int* out, const btVector3& point,int /*isMax*/) const
00261 {
00262         btVector3 clampedPoint(point);
00263         clampedPoint.setMax(m_localAabbMin);
00264         clampedPoint.setMin(m_localAabbMax);
00265 
00266         out[0] = getQuantized(clampedPoint.getX());
00267         out[1] = getQuantized(clampedPoint.getY());
00268         out[2] = getQuantized(clampedPoint.getZ());
00269                 
00270 }

00275 
00281 void    btHeightfieldTerrainShape::processAllTriangles(btTriangleCallback* callback,const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax) const
00282 {
00283         // scale down the input aabb's so they are in local (non-scaled) coordinates
00284         btVector3       localAabbMin = aabbMin*btVector3(1.f/m_localScaling[0],1.f/m_localScaling[1],1.f/m_localScaling[2]);
00285         btVector3       localAabbMax = aabbMax*btVector3(1.f/m_localScaling[0],1.f/m_localScaling[1],1.f/m_localScaling[2]);
00286 
00287         // account for local origin
00288         localAabbMin += m_localOrigin;
00289         localAabbMax += m_localOrigin;
00290 
00291         //quantize the aabbMin and aabbMax, and adjust the start/end ranges
00292         int     quantizedAabbMin[3];
00293         int     quantizedAabbMax[3];
00294         quantizeWithClamp(quantizedAabbMin, localAabbMin,0);
00295         quantizeWithClamp(quantizedAabbMax, localAabbMax,1);
00296         
00297         // expand the min/max quantized values
00298         // this is to catch the case where the input aabb falls between grid points!
00299         for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00300                 quantizedAabbMin[i]--;
00301                 quantizedAabbMax[i]++;
00302         }       
00303 
00304         int startX=0;
00305         int endX=m_heightStickWidth-1;
00306         int startJ=0;
00307         int endJ=m_heightStickLength-1;
00308 
00309         switch (m_upAxis)
00310         {
00311         case 0:
00312                 {
00313                         if (quantizedAabbMin[1]>startX)
00314                                 startX = quantizedAabbMin[1];
00315                         if (quantizedAabbMax[1]<endX)
00316                                 endX = quantizedAabbMax[1];
00317                         if (quantizedAabbMin[2]>startJ)
00318                                 startJ = quantizedAabbMin[2];
00319                         if (quantizedAabbMax[2]<endJ)
00320                                 endJ = quantizedAabbMax[2];
00321                         break;
00322                 }
00323         case 1:
00324                 {
00325                         if (quantizedAabbMin[0]>startX)
00326                                 startX = quantizedAabbMin[0];
00327                         if (quantizedAabbMax[0]<endX)
00328                                 endX = quantizedAabbMax[0];
00329                         if (quantizedAabbMin[2]>startJ)
00330                                 startJ = quantizedAabbMin[2];
00331                         if (quantizedAabbMax[2]<endJ)
00332                                 endJ = quantizedAabbMax[2];
00333                         break;
00334                 };
00335         case 2:
00336                 {
00337                         if (quantizedAabbMin[0]>startX)
00338                                 startX = quantizedAabbMin[0];
00339                         if (quantizedAabbMax[0]<endX)
00340                                 endX = quantizedAabbMax[0];
00341                         if (quantizedAabbMin[1]>startJ)
00342                                 startJ = quantizedAabbMin[1];
00343                         if (quantizedAabbMax[1]<endJ)
00344                                 endJ = quantizedAabbMax[1];
00345                         break;
00346                 }
00347         default:
00348                 {
00349                         //need to get valid m_upAxis
00350                         btAssert(0);
00351                 }
00352         }
00353 
00354         
00355   
00356 
00357         for(int j=startJ; j<endJ; j++)
00358         {
00359                 for(int x=startX; x<endX; x++)
00360                 {
00361                         btVector3 vertices[3];
00362                         if (m_flipQuadEdges || (m_useDiamondSubdivision && !((j+x) & 1))|| (m_useZigzagSubdivision  && !(j & 1)))
00363                         {
00364         //first triangle
00365         getVertex(x,j,vertices[0]);
00366                 getVertex(x, j + 1, vertices[1]);
00367                 getVertex(x + 1, j + 1, vertices[2]);
00368         callback->processTriangle(vertices,x,j);
00369         //second triangle
00370       //  getVertex(x,j,vertices[0]);//already got this vertex before, thanks to Danny Chapman
00371         getVertex(x+1,j+1,vertices[1]);
00372                 getVertex(x + 1, j, vertices[2]);
00373                 callback->processTriangle(vertices, x, j);
00374 
00375                         } else
00376                         {
00377         //first triangle
00378         getVertex(x,j,vertices[0]);
00379         getVertex(x,j+1,vertices[1]);
00380         getVertex(x+1,j,vertices[2]);
00381         callback->processTriangle(vertices,x,j);
00382         //second triangle
00383         getVertex(x+1,j,vertices[0]);
00384         //getVertex(x,j+1,vertices[1]);
00385         getVertex(x+1,j+1,vertices[2]);
00386         callback->processTriangle(vertices,x,j);
00387                         }
00388                 }
00389         }
00390 
00391         
00392 
00393 }
00394 
00395 void    btHeightfieldTerrainShape::calculateLocalInertia(btScalar ,btVector3& inertia) const
00396 {
00397         //moving concave objects not supported
00398         
00399         inertia.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.));
00400 }

00402 void    btHeightfieldTerrainShape::setLocalScaling(const btVector3& scaling)
00403 {
00404         m_localScaling = scaling;
00405 }
00406 const btVector3& btHeightfieldTerrainShape::getLocalScaling() const
00407 {
00408         return m_localScaling;
00409 }
